    • Method Detail

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Tests if this blob exists.
        Returns:
        true if this blob was actually operated on and persisted; false otherwise

      • size

        public long size()
        Retrieves the size of this blob.
        Returns:
        the size in bytes of the content of this blob or 0, if this blob doesn't actually exists()

      • updated

        public long updated()
        Retrieves the timestamp of the last update on this blob.
        Returns:
        the timestamp of the last update on this blob, measured in milliseconds since the epoch (00:00:00 GMT, January 1, 1970), or 0L if this blob oesn't actually exists()

      • data

        public byte[] data()
            throws UncheckedIOException
        Retrieves the binary content of this blob.
        Returns:
        the binary content of this blob
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading from this blob

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this blob
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if data is null
        UncheckedIOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to this blob

        Returns:

      • text

        public String text()
            throws UncheckedIOException
        Retrieves the textual content of this blob.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading from this blob

                throws UncheckedIOException
        Configures the textual content of this blob.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this blob
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if text is null
